languages.text: "Довериться адресату проклятой посылки, пусть даже и Вольному Торговцу? Вы слишком многого от меня хотите. Нет, я или лично прослежу, что эта мерзость будет уничтожена, или не сойду с этого корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Довериться неизвестной мне персоне, адресату проклятой посылки? Вы слишком многого от меня хотите. Нет, я или лично прослежу, что эта мерзость будет уничтожена, или не сойду с этого корабля".
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
languages.original_text: "Довериться адресату проклятой посылки, пусть даже и Вольному Торговцу? Вы слишком многого от меня хотите. Нет, я или лично прослежу, что эта мерзость будет уничтожена, или не сойду с этого корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

traits.locale_text: "Trust someone I do not know, someone who also happens to be the intended recipient of the damned package? You are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

traits.locale_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

traits.locale_text: "Trust someone I do not know, someone who also happens to be the intended recipient of the damned package? You are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

traits.locale_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

traits.locale_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: 「この不快な荷物を送られた者を信用しろと？いくら自由開拓者でも、無理な頼みです。その異物が破壊されるのをこの目で確かめない限り、この船から降りません」
languages.original_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."

traits.locale_text: 「私の知らない人物を…それも偶然にもこの忌まわしい荷物の受取人である者を信用しろと？いくらなんでもそれは無理でしょう。その忌々しいものを破壊するのをこの目で確かめられないのであれば、この船から降りません」
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: “您要我相信一个本该收到这件诅咒之物的人？无论您是不是行商浪人，您对我的要求都太苛刻了。不行，除非我亲眼看着那件诅咒的造物被摧毁，否则我绝不会离开这艘船。”
languages.original_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."

traits.locale_text: “您要我相信一个我不认识的人？相信一个本该收到这件诅咒之物的人？您对我的要求太苛刻了。不行，除非我亲眼看着那件诅咒的造物被摧毁，否则我绝不会离开这艘船。”
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: «¿Que confíe en {mf|el|la} destinatari{mf|o|a} original del maldito paquete? Comerciante Independiente o no, me pide demasiado. No. O veo personalmente cómo se destruye esa abominación, o me niego a abandonar la nave».
languages.original_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que confíe en alguien a quien no conozco, que además era {mf|el|la} destinatari{mf|o|a} original del maldito paquete? Me pide demasiado. No. O veo personalmente cómo se destruye esa abominación, o me niego a dejar la nave».
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: « Faire confiance {mf|au|à la} destinataire d'origine de ce satané colis ? {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ou pas, vous m'en demandez trop. Non, soit je m'occupe personnellement de la destruction de cette abomination, soit je reste sur ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."

traits.locale_text: « Faire confiance à {mf|un inconnu|une inconnue}, qui en plus se trouve être {mf|le|la} destinataire d'origine de ce satané colis ? Vous m'en demandez trop. Non, soit je m'occupe personnellement de la destruction de cette abomination, soit je reste sur ce vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: "Ich soll dem vorgesehene Empfänger des verdammten Pakets vertrauen? {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} hin oder her, Ihr verlangt zu viel von mir. Nein, entweder bin ich persönlich bei der Zerstörung dieser Abscheulichkeit dabei, oder ich werde das Schiff nicht verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."

traits.locale_text: "Jemandem vertrauen, den ich nicht kenne und der auch noch zufällig der vorgesehene Empfänger des verdammten Pakets ist? Ihr verlangt zu viel von mir. Nein, entweder bin ich persönlich bei der Zerstörung dieser Abscheulichkeit dabei, oder ich werde das Schiff nicht verlassen."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator

languages.text: "Kahrolası paketin ulaşması gereken kişiye mi güveneyim yani? Hür Tacir olun ya da olmayın benden çok şey istiyorsunuz. Hayır, o garabetin yok edildiğini bizzat görmeden bu gemiden ayrılmam."
languages.original_text: "Trust the intended recipient of the damned package? Rogue Trader or no, you are asking too much of me. No, either I will personally see that abomination destroyed, or I will not leave this ship."

traits.locale_text: "Kahrolası paketin ulaşması gereken kişiye güveneyim yani? Hür Tacir olun ya da olmayın benden çok şey istiyorsunuz. Hayır, ya o garabetin yok edildiğini bizzat göreceğim ya da bu gemiden ayrılmayacağım."
traits.speaker: HalfCrazyNavigator
